Home.title: Kaabo si Next.js!
Home.description: Eyi ni ohun elo rẹ ti a ti agbegbe.

ForgotPassword.enterContact: Tẹ {contactType} tí ó so mọ akọọlẹ rẹ lati tun ọrọigbaniwọle rẹ ṣe,

ForgotPassword.ifContactMatches: Ti {contact} ba ba akọọlẹ rẹ mu, a ti fi koodu ranṣẹ.

Wallet.title: Fọwọsi apamọwọ rẹ
Wallet.description: Nigbati o ba ṣẹda idogo, apamọwọ ati alaye gbigbe banki rẹ gbọdọ jẹ akiyesi lẹsẹkẹsẹ. O ko le ṣẹda idogo miiran títí ti akọkọ yoo fi pari tabi parí. Awọn owo maa n de ni wakati 1–2.
